scripts.postinstall: npm run bower && cd server && npm install
scripts.cleardeps: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules && rm -rf bower_components
scripts.install_globals: npm install --global puer strongloop nodemon && npm update -g puer strongloop nodemon
scripts.devinstall: npm run install_globals && npm prune && npm install && npm update && npm run devbower && cd server && npm prune && npm install && npm update
scripts.devbower: bower prune && bower install && bower update
